text: Dera Taj railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Dera Taj village, Khanewal district of Punjab province, Pakistan. The station is named after the famous contractor and builder, Mian Taj Muhammad. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Khanewal District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Dera Taj railway station
